body.name: Brother MFC-J5340DW Business Color Inkjet All-in-One Printer with Printing up to 11”x17 (Ledger) Size Capabilities
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 46 mins
features: FEATURES BROTHER MAXIDRIVE INKJET TECHNOLOGY: Delivering Brother’s fastest and most durable traditional color inkjets ever.
TRIPLE LAYER SECURITY HELPS KEEP DOCUMENTS SECURE: Helps create secure connections to the device and network, safeguarding sensitive documents while printing.

PRINTS UP TO 11” X 17” (LEDGER) SIZE PAPER: Print up to 11"x17" from a 250-sheet capacity paper tray(1) or the single sheet bypass tray. Use the 50-page automatic document feeder(1) to copy, scan or fax up to 8.5"x11" (Letter) size capabilities.
CONNECT YOUR WAY – built-in dual band wireless(2.4GHz / 5GHz)(2), Wi-Fi Direct, Ethernet, local USB connection, or print & scan on-the-go through the Brother Mobile Connect App(3)
PRINT CONFIDENTLY WITH BROTHER GENUINE INK: From homework to business reports, Brother Genuine Ink is engineered to perform optimally with your Brother Color Inkjet printer.
body.description: The MFC-J5340DW Brother Color Inkjet All-in-One Printer delivers economical, reliable, professional-quality printing for any small office or home workspace. A smart choice for users who frequently print, copy, scan and fax, this all-in-one print solution raises the bar on simplicity and productivity. With print speeds up to 28ppm (black and color)1 and a 250-sheet paper tray capacity2 (up to 11”x17” paper size) makes handling large print jobs a breeze. Access features on the go when connected through a wireless network with the free Brother Mobile Connect App3 . Have it all, at an affordable price, with the Brother MFC-J5340DW Color Inkjet All-in-One Printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet printer low cost ink
reviews.reviewText: Need up to 11x17 prints that are good? Get this. The software is improving bit by bit. But easily the best all in one I've ever had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It prints 11x 17 copies
reviews.reviewText: i liked the way it prints 11 x 17 copies by extending the input tray. my old printer i had to feed one at a time through the back of the printer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars HUGE INK PROBLEM!!!
reviews.reviewText: I started a small printing company and bought a brother 5855. It worked well so I decided to purchase a second printer to use as a backup. This was the only one being offered on installments. I should have realized right there that something was amiss but thinking it would work just like the 5855 I decided to purchase. Boy was I wrong!!!1. The ink cartridges (402) are smaller than the 406 used in the 5855.2. Runs out of ink extremely quickly!!!3. The printer has a permanent memory that records every cartridge you put in.4. This means you cannot reuse a cartridge even if you refill it or swap it out with another one first.5. You cannot buy cartridges in bulk and stock since they carry a batch code and the printer will not recognize a new cartridge if it carries the same code as the old one.6. You have to wait until Brother or whoever came up with this rubbish to decide to manufacture another batch of cartridges with a different code in order to purchase and again you run into problems 3 through 5.7. Looked at ALL the reviews available before purchasing and no one had mentioned the ink problem.8. What good is a printer if you cannot print???WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars super happy with this printer!
reviews.reviewText: The fact it will auto-scan was about all I needed to be thrilled, my last all-in-one had to be done one by one, but everything has been superb. I've had low usage for about a month and still am on the supplied ink. It prints a little slow for a full page color photo but that is not what I need so I don't consider it a 'con'.I researched many all-in-ones at this price range and below and the only 'con' I could say about this is it is a little big. Bit it also appears to be quite the workhorse. If you purchase, enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is really but ink is hard to find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars what good is a printer when the letters are faded
reviews.reviewText: the features are nice on this printer But the print quality is poor . the ink on the the paper appears to be faded as if one is about to run out of ink. changed the dpi to 600 and that didn't do much. if you don't care about the print quality its a great machine! the color is fine but the grey scale is bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money for Ledger Printing/Scanning
reviews.reviewText: I only purchased this printer for ledger sized work and it is not at all capable of scanning or copying ledger sized docs. Waste of money, I missed the return window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Paper feed in both tray and scanner do not work
reviews.reviewText: A cheaply made product not worth the price. Once would expect a printer to have a paper feed that actually works. Neither the tray or the scanner tray feeds paper. Piece of junk.

The media could not be loaded. Previo a este equipo tenía un 6920 de la misma línea (solo que más antiguo, obviamente) y la verdad es que ha Sido una mejora sorprendente, mayor velocidad de copiado e impresión y acción del alimentador de documentos en definitiva es superior. El cambio más notable es el tamaño del área de escaneado ya que el cristal no permite el copiado desde este mismo de documentos superiores al tamaño carta. Para copiar documentos tamaño oficio y doble carta hay que hacerlo desde el alimentador de documentos y las hojas hay que colocarlas desde el depósito de hijas trasero y de una en una (esto te tomara un poco más de tiempo) pero si no haces muchas copias doble carta o impresiones ni siquiera te resultará molesto. Se entiende que los cartuchos de tinta sean caros pero podrás encontrar en Youtube tutoriales para otras opciones.Calidad de impresión 10/10 y además trabaja las hojas opalinas y el papel fotográfico sin problemas.
Buena y rápida para imprimir sin embargo el espacio para escanear o copiar manualmente es muy pequeño, creo que podía poner un doble carta ahí

reviews.reviewTitle: No funciona, dejo de leer los cartuchos
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. No tiene ni el mes que lo tengo y ya no imprime y si imprime solo sale color rojo, tanto en copias, imprecisiones y fax, ya igual dice que no tiene tinta cuando están llenos los cartuchos son nuevos me costó 2000 y sólo imprimí 120 copias y empezó a marcar que ya no tiene tinta :c muy decepcionado de esta compra
Es una impresora muy completa, tiene función para doble carta, me encanta.Es un super precio que la consiguiera en $5 mil pesos

reviews.reviewTitle: No tiene la opción de imprimir dúplex
reviews.reviewText: En la descripción dice que imprime dúplex y no trae esa manera de imprimir.
